Question: At Cleanroom System(Shenzhen) Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
At Cleanroom System(Shenzhen) Co., Ltd

Product: CES 2024

- Deebot X2 Combo showcased at CES 2024 is a robot vacuum and mop combined with a handheld vacuum.
- Features 8000Pa of suction power, dual oscillating mop heads, and automatic carpet detection.
- Dreame X30 Ultra robot vacuum and mop features an anti-tangle feature, 8000Pa suction power, and automatic carpet detection.
- EcoFlow Delta Pro Ultra is a portable battery with 6kWh capacity, stackable up to 90kWh, and can be charged with AC, solar, or gas generators.
- Lockly Visage Facial Recognition Smart Lock supports facial recognition, fingerprint reader, and keypad unlocking, available for $349.
- Panasonic announced a new collaboration with Fresco for an AI assistant for Panasonic kitchen appliances.
